turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hi, I need to check my checking account balance and see my recent transactions.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can certainly help with that. Could you please verify your identity by providing the last four digits of your social security number and your date of birth?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, it's [last four digits] and [date of birth]. But honestly, I'm a little confused. I recently saw a charge on my account that I don't recognize. What's the process to dispute that?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you. I have verified your identity. Your current checking account balance is [amount]. Regarding the unrecognized charge, you can report it through the 'Dispute a Transaction' section within the account activity. Select the transaction, provide a brief explanation of why you don't recognize it, and submit. A representative will review it within 2-3 business days. If you need assistance locating that section, please ask.
